response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and capabilities, I believe its true value exceeds $12,000. Considering the exceptional benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you with a special offer of $15,000. This is an opportunity to own a piece of cutting-edge technology that could potentially save you thousands in the long run. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or if you're interested in making this purchase.", "product_price": 15000}
